brief: A box is an extruded rectangle.
name: box()
description:
A box is an extruded rectangle. A box with equal dimension on all sides
 is a cube.

parameters.name: graphics
parameters.description: any object of the type PGraphics

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: dimension of the box in all dimensions (creates a cube)

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the x-dimension

parameters.name: h
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the y-dimension

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the z-dimension
